name: prematch_event
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sports_betting_api.
Tool description: Get up and running in less than 5 minutes with our comprehensive developer documentation. Get Start - https://bet365soft.com/docs
API description: Fetches pre-match event data from a sports betting API.

lang.description: The language code for the API response.

evt.description: The event ID to fetch information for.
